actions.name: Bite
actions.description: [Melee Attack]: 7 (2d6) and pass [Endure] or become Sickened (Cd4, +1 Fatigue each Round).

abilities.name: Webs
abilities.description: Its web is an Object with 4 HP and Armor: 5.

abilities.name: Web Walker
abilities.description: It can sense any Being on the same web as it as if by Blindsight, and is not impeded by web as Difficult Terrain.

system.gmNotes: Man-sized venomous spiders distinguished by their red hourglass mark.
